title: Kiha & The Faces
text:
Kiha & The Faces (Korean: 장기하와 얼굴들) was a South Korean indie rock band led by singer Chang Kiha. The band debuted in 2008 with the single "Cheap Coffee" and went on to become one of South Korea's most popular and commercially successful indie rock bands. In October 2018, Chang announced the group's fifth and final album, Mono, along with news that the band members would be parting ways.


== Members ==


=== Former members ===
Chang Kiha - Vocals, Guitar
Lee Min-ki - Guitar
Jeong Jung-yeop - Bass guitar
Lee Jong-min - Keyboard
Yohei Hasegawa - Guitar
Jeon Il-jun - Drum
Mimi Sisters - Dance, Chorus
Kim Hyeon-ho - Drum

== Honors ==
In 2012, Kiha & The Faces were given the South Korean Minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism Commendation for increasing public interest in indie music through their songs.
